attributes.action: The 2016 referendum was unfairly biased, undemocratic and should be annulled.
attributes.additional_details: By holding the 2016 referendum as a binary issue and combining the votes cast for a no deal with the votes cast for a deal, the 2016 referendum was either deliberately or mistakenly skewed towards a leave result. I call on Parliament to recognise that the 2016 referendum was delivered in such a manner as was disloyal to the crown and the general public and should be annulled.
attributes.background:
Action is required on this petition, as it can be demonstrated the outcome of the 2016 election was undemocratic and was not fit for purpose. It is certain, that a group that had the minority support from the voting electorate will be the, “winners.” 
Democracy must be restored.
